Methods.method_description:
Constructs a key pair from the given public key and private key.

 
Note that this constructor only stores references to the public
 and private key components in the generated key pair. This is safe,
 because Key objects are immutable.

return_description: a reference to the private key.

Methods.method_description: Returns a reference to the private key component of this key pair.

return_description: a reference to the public key.

Methods.method_description: Returns a reference to the public key component of this key pair.
